1.12.2.0.1.1:
- Changes -
  Increased explosion resistance to 5.
  IE-Manual Entries a little bit.
  Increased contrast for almost all post textures.
  Copper-post texture to give it the patina look.
  Mini-arms now appear on the top most post block.
  Mini-arms are now included into the selection boundry.
  Clamped selection bounds for arms.

- Fixes -
  Fences connecting to posts and base.

At some point i'll make it so that fences and rod items only take up one block/item id. So far every fence uses it's own Block ID, same with Rods which is a waste of space.
And to keep you guys from going insane with the updates, i'll leave it like this for now. Until then have fun!
1.12.2.0.1.0:
This is a rather big one, with lots of new stuff being added.
I highly recommend making a backup of your world befor loading it with this update!

- Additions -
10 new posts and matching fences (and rods to craft said fences) to use for extending. (See list below.)

- Changes -
"improved" pages for the IE Manual Category.
Added recipes for the fences mentioned above in the manual aswell.



- List of post types. -
  Constantan
  Copper
  Electrum
  Gold
  Iron
  Lead
  Nickel
  Silver
  Uranium
  and Nether-Brick (Because why not)

- Changes -
Post "mini-arms" now behave like the ones from IE.
  As you'd expect them to.
Being a perfectionist with textures.
